name: Energy Cookies
author: miskyn
summary: These cookies are a great source of protein.
ingredients: 1 cup shelled hemp seeds (such as Hemp Hearts®)
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper
Mix brown sugar, butter, and egg in a bowl until well blended
Mix hemp seeds, flour, and cinnamon together in a separate bowl
Stir into the brown sugar mixture until dough comes together
Drop spoonfuls of dough onto the baking sheet; flatten with the back of the spoon
Bake cookies in the preheated oven until edges are crisp, 8 to 11 minutes
Transfer to a wire rack to cool, 10 to 15 minutes
